text: Khin Ma Gyi ( , born 25 April 1952) is a Burmese politician and physician currently serves as an Amyotha Hluttaw MP for Kachin State No. 8 constituency. She is a member of the National League for Democracy. ==Early life and education== She was born on 25 April 1952 in Monywa, Sagaing Region, Myanmar. She graduated with M.B.B.S. from University of Medicine, Mandalay. ==Political career== She is a member of the National League for Democracy. In the 2015 Myanmar general election, she was elected as an Amyotha Hluttaw MP, winning a majority 25580 vote and elected representative from Kachin State No. 8 parliamentary constituency. ==References== Category:National League for Democracy politicians Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:People from Sagaing Region Category:University of Medicine, Mandalay alumni
title: Khin Ma Gyi
